name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
New York Times: China has set up "snail awards" in many places to humiliate cadres who lie flat and do nothing.
In recent years, as Xi Jinping has stepped up anti-corruption efforts, the country has cracked down on various fields such as the Internet, tutoring, and finance. It is now impossible to guess what will happen next. Some officials have no motivation for fear of anti-corruption purges, and even simply lie flat and do nothing.
But as the economy slows, Chinese leaders need to launch new projects to attract investors. Now may be the time when the Chinese government can least tolerate officials' slackness.
According to the People's Daily, at least three cities have begun to issue "snail awards". Punish and humiliate cadres who lie flat and do nothing. A video of an official TV program on Chinese social media showed several men in suits and expressionless faces receiving framed certificates.
A district in Guangdong Province said they had established a database to track those "officials who lie flat." Other places have also promoted their own...
fullContent:
纽约时报：中国多地设立“蜗牛奖”羞辱躺平和不作为的干部。
 近年来，由于习近平加大反腐力度，国家打击了互联网、家教、金融等各个领域。导致现在已经无法猜测接下来会发生什么，一些官员因害怕反腐清洗而没有动力，甚至干脆躺平不作为。
 但随着经济放缓，中国领导人需要推出新项目吸引投资者，现在或许是中国政府最不能容忍官员懈怠的时候。
 据《人民日报》报道，至少有三个城市开始颁发“蜗牛奖”。惩罚羞辱那些躺平不作为的干部。中国社交媒体上的一段官方电视节目视频显示，几名穿着西装、面无表情的男子接过装裱好的证书。
 广东省一个城区表示，他们建立了一个数据库，用来追踪那些““躺平”的官员。”还有的地方还宣传了自己对员工进行岗位调整或解雇的处理。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 20, Fu Yuehua's cousin posted a video saying that Fu Yuehua had been trying desperately to save herself, but failed to pull herself out of the abyss. Her father was unable to accept his daughter's departure and has been hospitalized since the fourth day of the Lunar New Year. And the family has been suppressed to varying degrees. In order to win the lawsuit smoothly, they will refuse any form of donations. Although the heat is getting lower and lower, they will insist on speaking out to the end.
https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892610235334090752/pu/img/rX2x3YUgzgRyRljF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 20, Yu Chengdong said at the press conference: "Our Wenjie, Xiangjie, Zhijie, and Zunjie series vehicles all have the ability to sense bacteria and viruses, and the vehicles can also actively kill viruses. The bacteria inhibition rate in the car exceeds 99%, and the influenza A and coronavirus inhibition rate exceeds 99%." Netizens replied: "It is recommended to include it in the second category of medical equipment, and you can use medical insurance to buy the car." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892616830692556802/pu/img/8mAh4hfnrumTY2uD.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 20, Shenyang, Liaoning. It was reported online that a car hit pedestrians near the Huaiyuan Gate scenic spot. The video shows that many people fell to the ground and medical staff were treating them on the spot. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892621144743657472/pu/img/DaHv5UuM6cSpagoW.jpg

content: French media interviewed Ukrainians: What do you think of Trump's criticism of Zelensky as a "dictator"? Do you think he is a dictator? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892637928641462274/pu/img/fekBmMVnaZFq9vkC.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the online rumor of a bullying incident at Wuchuan Middle School, the school began investigating whether students took videos and forwarded them. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkQED2aXQAAZG8d.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 20, the man said that he applied for a teaching position at the Gansu Provincial Party School in July 2022. However, the school's party organization department did not arrange an exam for this batch of about 1,000 candidates, nor did it publish an announcement on the official website to cancel the exam. The school is also unwilling to arrange another exam.
Netizens said, is it possible that this recruitment is not for you 1,000 people https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892662776243617793/pu/img/NhPNT6QMGhejY_Cm.jpg
